title: Switched
description: She traded places with a killer…There’s a little cabin in the Fear Street woods where a girl can really lose her mind. In fact, she can change it into someone else’s. That’s what happened to Nicole and Lucy. Now Lucy is in Nicole’s body, and Nicole is in Lucy’s. What a trip!But for Nicole, what a trap! Because Lucy is using Nicole’s body to get away with murder!
author: R.L. Stine
